thread.section_title: Hotel Da Vinci & Spa - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing
thread.title_full: Amazing - Review of Hotel Da Vinci & Spa, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Angie_R
title: Amazing
text:
My husband and I stayed for 2 nights at this hotel in Feb 2017. From the minute we arrived the staff couldn't be more helpful. The smell in the hotel is amazing. They even sell the air freshener.
The room couldn't be any smaller but it was perfect and the bathroom was brand new with all toiletries provided.
The bed was the most comfortable I have ever slept in.
We had a look around the beautiful private spa but sadly we didn't have the time to fit it in.
The metro is a 5 minute walk to the hotel from St Germain de peres. The hotel is 10 minutes walk from La Louvre.
There is an amazing macaron shop in the next road which also serves food upstairs - Labadee.
The honesty bar in the hotel was cozy and warm. The framed picture of Mona Lisa was good fun for taking selfies.
We will definitely return to this hotel again.
